title: AC/Rechargeable Beard Styler ER-GD60/GD40
description:
As well as being ideal for trimming and shaving your beard, Panasonic's handy AC/Rechargeable Beard Styler lets you create clear, sharp lines and detailed areas such as a soul patch. And thanks to its I-shaped design, you can hold it like a pen and enjoy fingertip control for easy, precise beard design.

The newly developed Skin Protective Blade cuts whiskers while being gentle on the skin, so you don't have to worry even if you're using it for the first time. Better still, cordless operation makes it easy to use, and when you've finished you can detach the blade and wash it with water for simple maintenance.

asset.author: Channel Panasonic - Official
